trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.IPageableItemContainer.TotalRowCountAvailable"></xref> event of a class that implements the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.IPageableItemContainer"></xref> interface.
trans-unit.target: Gir dataene for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.IPageableItemContainer.TotalRowCountAvailable"> </xref> hendelsen av en klasse som implementerer den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.IPageableItemContainer"> </xref> grensesnitt.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> object raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IPageableItemContainer.TotalRowCountAvailable> event when the control has obtained the total number of records of the underlying data source object.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>objekt hever den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IPageableItemContainer.TotalRowCountAvailable>-hendelse når kontrollen har anskaffet antall poster for det underliggende datakildeobjektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IPageableItemContainer.TotalRowCountAvailable> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> control provides an event handler for this event named <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.OnTotalRowCountAvailable%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager>Kontrollen gir hendelsesbehandling for denne hendelsen navnet <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.OnTotalRowCountAvailable%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.OnTotalRowCountAvailable%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager>

trans-unit.source: This event handler initializes page-related properties and creates the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField> objects that are defined in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.Fields%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsesbehandlingen initialiserer siden-relaterte egenskaper og oppretter den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField>objekter som er definert i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.Fields%2A?displayProperty=fullName>samlingen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.Fields%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IPageableItemContainer.TotalRowCountAvailable> event is primarily used by control developers.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IPageableItemContainer.TotalRowCountAvailable>hendelsen brukes hovedsakelig av kontrollutviklere.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IPageableItemContainer.TotalRowCountAvailable>

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to handle events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om hvordan du håndtere [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of the PageEventArgs class, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PageEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: En liste med opprinnelige verdier for en forekomst av klassen PageEventArgs, kan du se den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PageEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>konstruktør.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PageEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.PageEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.PageEventArgs"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: You can use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PageEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke denne konstruktøren for å initialisere en ny forekomst av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PageEventArgs>klassen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PageEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This constructor is primarily used by control developers when raising events.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Denne konstruktøren brukes primært av kontrollutviklere ved å heve hendelser.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PageEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser første egenskapsverdier for en forekomst av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PageEventArgs>klassen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PageEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PageEventArgs.StartRowIndex%2A>|The value of the `startRowIndex` parameter.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PageEventArgs.MaximumRows%2A>|The value of the `maximumRows` parameter.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PageEventArgs.TotalRowCount%2A>|The value of the `totalRowCount` parameter.|
trans-unit.target: | Egenskapen | Standardverdi | |--------------|-------------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PageEventArgs.StartRowIndex%2A>| Verdien for den `startRowIndex` parameteren. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PageEventArgs.MaximumRows%2A>| Verdien for den `maximumRows` parameteren. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PageEventArgs.TotalRowCount%2A>| Verdien for den `totalRowCount` parameteren. |</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PageEventArgs.TotalRowCount%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PageEventArgs.MaximumRows%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PageEventArgs.StartRowIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: The index of the first record on a page of data.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen for den første posten på en side med data.

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of items to display on each page of data.
trans-unit.target: Maksimalt antall elementer som skal vises på hver side av data.

trans-unit.source: The total number of records.
trans-unit.target: Totalt antall poster.

trans-unit.source: Gets the maximum number of records to display on each page.
trans-unit.target: Henter maksimalt antall poster som skal vises på hver side.

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of records to display on each page.
trans-unit.target: Maksimalt antall poster som skal vises på hver side.

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the first record on a page.
trans-unit.target: Henter indeksen for den første posten på en side.

trans-unit.source: The index of the first record on a page.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen for den første posten på en side.

trans-unit.source: Gets the total number of records in the underlying data source.
trans-unit.target: Henter antall poster i den underliggende datakilden.

trans-unit.source: The total number of records of the underlying data source.
trans-unit.target: Totalt antall poster for den underliggende datakilden.
